column1: mary ann ballman| mary ann ballman
column7: 2015 at cambridge place in marysville. visitation will be tuesday
column8: june 23 from 10 a. m. to 5 p. m. at kinsley mortuary. a rosary service will be held at 7 p. m.
column9: tuesday at st. gregory's catholic church in marysville. mass of christian burial will be held at 10 a. m.
column11: june 24 at st. gregory's catholic church. burial will be in the church cemetery. a memorial fund has been established to st. gregory's catholic school. contributions may be sent in care of kinsley mortuary.
